Dear Graydon:
When you suggested at Norman that I give you an estimate of the cost of an In-School
Conference, I asked Jim Miles to send me a statement of the expenses of the Lafayette
meeting held in 1952. His letter has just reached me this morning, and I shall en¬
close a copy. Meanwhile, I have checked railroad fares to Urbana rad have estimated
the cost of food and hotel at $10.00 per day. .
For The Entire Committee
